lemma mrw_values_mrw: assumes mrw: "mrw_values P vs0 (map snd obs) (ad, al) = \<lfloor>(v, b)\<rfloor>" and initial: "vs0 (ad, al) = \<lfloor>(v, b)\<rfloor> \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>wa. wa \<in> set (map snd obs) \<and> is_write_action wa \<and> (ad, al) \<in> action_loc_aux P wa \<and> (b \<longrightarrow> \<not> is_new_action wa)" shows "\<exists>i. i < length obs \<and> P,llist_of (obs @ [(t, NormalAction (ReadMem ad al v))]) \<turnstile> length obs \<leadsto>mrw i \<and> value_written P (llist_of obs) i (ad, al) = v"
